plot: Her name was Grace, but she wasn't given any... A survivor of Catholic child abuse in Ireland's Magdalene Laundries looks back on her life, contemplating the possibility of hope and asking what chance there is for justice.
title: Grace, Hope and Justice
plot_es: Her name was Grace, but she wasn't given any... A survivor of Catholic child abuse in Ireland's Magdalene Laundries looks back on her life, contemplating the possibility of hope and asking what chance there is for justice.
plot_en: Her name was Grace, but she wasn't given any... A survivor of Catholic child abuse in Ireland's Magdalene Laundries looks back on her life, contemplating the possibility of hope and asking what chance there is for justice.
